Summary: saw green glowing ball in the sky then it seemed to fall into cemetery across the street from my house
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Bangor
There were no other sightings in Bangor on or around May 1st 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsSeen a green orb like object glowing in sky then it fell on a angle and looked like it fell into the cemetery across the street from my house . It scared me more than anything has scared me before . I have no clue what it was but can't get it out of my head
